items.sentence: I can't leave the house until I put some makeup on.
I wish Tom hadn't said that to me in front of Mary.
We don't really need to worry about that happening.
We found ourselves between a rock and a hard place.
I think that's the reason why Tom isn't here today.
I was shocked when I learned that Tom got arrested.
I wish that I had more time to do things like this.
Tom is back home living with his parents in Boston.
Tom is from small town about three hours from here.
Tom won't get back to Boston until after Christmas.
